datatool package¶

  • Datatool

datatool module¶

datatool - to make cleaning data easier and faster,

Created by: Scott Walton

It should be noted: you may use the application’s procedures without ever opening the GUI.

datatool.procedures module¶

Commonly used procedures are kept here to keep code clean as well as make life easier.

datatool.procedures.closest_date(series, date=Timestamp('2018-12-02 00:00:36.257983'), period='future')¶

Chooses the date closest to the given date in a given pandas series in the given direction.

param series:A pandas series of dates, or dates in string format
param date:The date to find the nearest value from. Defaults to today.
param period:The direction to search for nearest date in. Can either be ‘past’ or ‘future’.
Returns:
Nearest date to given date as a string.
datatool.procedures.csv_from_excel(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs')¶

Converts all xls files at the given path to CSV files and outputs them into a directory named after the file. If the xls file has sheets, those are also outputted to the new directory.

param path=os.getcwd(:
 The path to the xls file(s).
datatool.procedures.drop_quote_rows(df)¶

Iterates over a dataframe and drops all rows that contain quotes as part of the string.

param df:The dataframe to perform the operation on.
Returns:
Pandas DataFrame
datatool.procedures.fix_dates(df, column=None)¶

Converts almost any date format to MM/DD/YYYY.

param df:The dataframe to perform the operation on.
param column:The column to convert dates on. (accepts lists)
Returns:
Pandas DataFrame
datatool.procedures.fix_ranks(df, ranks='Current Ranks', programs='Programs')¶

Distributes values in ranks column into columns created based on unique values in programs column.

param df:The dataframe to perform the operation on.
param ranks:The values that need to be distributed.
param programs:The values to create columns of.
Returns:
Pandas DataFrame
datatool.procedures.load(path, directory=None)¶

Loads the given filename found at filepath with the preferred options. Accepts CSV, XLS, XLSX, HTML, and XML.

param filename:The name of the file.
param filepath:The path of the file.
Returns:
Pandas DataFrame
datatool.procedures.remove_non_numeric(df, column='Phone')¶
Removes everything but numeric characters from phone column.
param df:The dataframe to perform the operation on.
param column:The column to perform the operation on. (accepts lists)
return:Pandas DataFrame
datatool.procedures.split_emails(df, column)¶

Splits the comma separated values in the emails column into a maximum of 3 different columns.

param df:The dataframe to perform the operation on.
param column:The column to split.
return:Pandas DataFrame
datatool.procedures.split_phones(df, column)¶

Distributes the values in the phones column based on the identifier given in parentheses into either Home, Mobile, or Work.

param df:The dataframe to perform the operation on.
param phones:The column with phones to split.
return:Pandas DataFrame
datatool.procedures.strip_whitespace(df, column=None)¶

Removes all leading and trailing whitespace. Replaces all newlines, carriage returns, and invisible tab-breaks with a space.

If a column isn’t specified, it acts on the entire dataframe.

param df:The dataframe to perform the operation on.
param column:The column to perform the operation on. (accepts lists)
Returns:
Pandas DataFrame
datatool.procedures.tidy_split(df, column='Members', sep=', ')¶

Splits a column of comma separated values into their own rows with values identical to the original.

param df:The dataframe to perform the operation on.
param column=’Members’:
 The column of values to split.
param sep=’ ‘:The separator
Returns:
Pandas DataFrame

datatool.software module¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from various softwares.

Created by: Scott Walton

datatool.software.ASF_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', key='ASF ACCT#')¶

Fully automated cleaning of ASF export files.

datatool.software.CW_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', key='RecordName')¶

Fully automated cleaning of PerfectMind’s free export files.

datatool.software.KS_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs')¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from KickSite.

datatool.software.MB_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', key='MBSystemID')¶

Fully automated cleaning of MindBody’s paid export. Needs expansion to handle the free one.

datatool.software.MS_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', holder='students')¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from Member Solutions.

Note: This is the most well done fix and should be used as an example.

datatool.software.PM_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', key='RecordName')¶

Fully automated cleaning of PerfectMind’s paid export files.

datatool.software.RM_fix(path, parents=None, date=Timestamp('2018-12-02 00:00:36.364243'))¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from Rainmaker. Returns the file and outputs it to the current working directory.

param path:Full path to the Rainmaker export.
param date:The date the export was pulled from Rainmaker.
param parents:Path to Parents’ Names export file.
datatool.software.ZP_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs')¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from ZenPlanner.

datatool.software.merge_KS_SP(kicksiteFile, solupayFile, checkLast=False)¶
